product_description: Product Description The jumbo Safari Floor Puzzle features beautiful original artwork that depicts a scene from the African plains. Kids can learn about different kinds of animals that make the savannah their home, as well as recognize some of their favorites including giraffes, an elephant, and a zebra. The large floor puzzle measures over four feet long when it's assembled, and the 100 extra-thick cardboard pieces feature an easy-to-clean surface to keep it looking like new. Playing with this Safari puzzle is a great way for kids to explore the magnificent world of the savannah while developing their cognitive, physical, and emotional skills. When children work on puzzles, they are fine-tuning their gross motor skills, improving their hand-eye coordination, strengthening their problem-solving skills, and beginning to develop logic and critical thinking processes. This Melissa & Doug puzzle makes an exceptional gift for preschoolers and kids ages six and older for hands-on, screen-free play. From the Manufacturer The best graphics; largest size; and lowest priced floor puzzles in the business!
